entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 5 May 2023
